comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Oops, I forgot to add them. I had actually made the new page before originally adding the QR/Copy buttons and completely neglected to port the changes over to the new code.

comments.author: BugsBanni.1397
comments.body:
Hey,
just noticed this the first moment, when looking over the new account page: The QR-Button and Copy-Button are gone again

You guys just forgot them or is there a reason for them not being there?
